#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std; 

int main()
{
	int t,n,*a={0},sum,count;
	cin>>t;
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		sum=0;count=0;
		cin>>n;
		a=new int[n];
		for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
		{
			cin>>a[j];
			sum+=a[j];
		}
		
		if(sum%n!=0)
		cout<<-1<<"\n";
		else
		{
			sum=sum/n;
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(sum>a[j])
				count+=(sum-a[j]);
				else
				count+=a[j]-sum;
			}
			cout<<count<<"\n";
		}
		
	}
	
	
	
	
	
	
	return 0;
}
